name: Lorien Spectrum | Happy Fun Kill Club Series 1
description: Common Rainbow Wizard Character Card for use in the Happy Fun Kill Club game.

attributes.value: Prismatic Ray is a ranged attack that costs 3 energy to use and can cause a maximum of 40 damage.
Spectrum Heal is a supporting action that costs 2 energy to use and can heal this character or an ally by up to 30health points if it is effective.
Chromatic Dash is a ranged supporting action that costs 2 energy to use and can increase this character or an ally's speed by 20 points if it is effective.
